title: Massive Solar Plus Storage Facility To Replace Both Coal And Natural Gas
description:
Hundreds of sheep graze among the panels at the Sherco Solar power plant in Minnesota, which is slated for a major solar plus storage expansion.

The post Massive Solar Plus Storage Facility To Replace Both Coal And Natural Gas appeared first on CleanTechnica.
